text: Kare (daudo) wa,`kare ga anata no hitsuji o, torikomou to shita no wa, tashika ni futodesu. Hontoni kyodo de shigoto o suru mono no oku wa, tagaini okashi au. Shinko shite zenko ni isoshimu mono wa betsudaga, sore wa maredesu.' To itta. (Sonotoki) daudo wa, ware ga kare o kokoromita koto o Yuiri,-nushi no o yurushi o koi, reihai ni hirefushi, kaigo shite omo no omoto ni kaetta. 〔Sajida〕
